body:
Migrater test occasionally panics like this

```
	/opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.12.14/x64/src/runtime/panic.go:522 +0x1b5
vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/topo.(*Server).GetTablet(0xc00022ddc0, 0x11351a0, 0xc00000c0c8, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
	/home/runner/work/vitess/vitess/go/vt/topo/tablet.go:232 +0x51
vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/wrangler.(*Wrangler).buildMigrationTargets(0xc0002473b0, 0x11351a0, 0xc00000c0c8, 0xfa3d1f, 0x3, 0xfa479d, 0x4, 0x1, 0xc000233710, 0x10, ...)
	/home/runner/work/vitess/vitess/go/vt/wrangler/migrater.go:373 +0x1a9
vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/wrangler.(*Wrangler).buildMigrater(0xc0002473b0, 0x11351a0, 0xc00000c0c8, 0xfa3d1f, 0x3, 0xfa479d, 0x4, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
	/home/runner/work/vitess/vitess/go/vt/wrangler/migrater.go:268 +0x91
vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/wrangler.(*Wrangler).MigrateReads(0xc0002473b0, 0x11351a0, 0xc00000c0c8, 0xfa3d1f, 0x3, 0xfa479d, 0x4, 0x3, 0xc000233f38, 0x1, ...)
	/home/runner/work/vitess/vitess/go/vt/wrangler/migrater.go:105 +0xce
vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/wrangler.TestTableMigrateMainflow(0xc000252000)
	/home/runner/work/vitess/vitess/go/vt/wrangler/migrater_test.go:80 +0x4da
testing.tRunner(0xc000252000, 0x1000d88)
	/opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.12.14/x64/src/testing/testing.go:865 +0xc0
created by testing.(*T).Run
	/opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.12.14/x64/src/testing/testing.go:916 +0x35a
FAIL	vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/wrangler	0.041s
```
title: wrangler flaky test: migrater
